settings.title: What to do before prom?
settings.answer: Prep up! Spend your free time planning and preparing for prom. Take it one step at a time. Begin with your prom dress, and be sure to check your schoolâs dress code carefully. If you need to send photos in advance, do that before buying a dress. Then, look for matching accessories, like shoes, prom bag, and jewelry. Make appointments for hair, makeup, and nails. Also, book your ride to and from the venue. Great planning is the key to avoid prom fails. Our prom guide has all the information related to Prom dos and donâts, so give it a read!

settings.title: What to do at prom?
settings.answer: Have the best time of your life. Prom is a celebration of you and your high school career. Expect a lot of dancing, flirting, and a little bit of drama. Stay prepared for dancing and socializing all night and then indulging in the after-prom activities.Â

settings.title: What happens at prom?
settings.answer: Prom is a celebration of high school goers. An event is conducted by the school authorities and a committee is appointed for the same. It is a formal event that demands everyone to dress formally in prom dresses, long gowns, tuxedos, suits, etc. Exchange of prom flowers is a tradition. Usually, prom queen and king are announced, who perform a dance together and then the floor is opened for all to dance the night away. Some schools also conduct after-prom activities that are comparatively less formal and include eating, drinking, and playing fun games together.Â

settings.title: What does prom mean?
settings.answer: Prom is a traditional high school event conducted every year around April-May. It is a formal event conducted by the school authorities by appointing a prom committee. Usually, prom is followed by a casual after-prom party. School goers dress up formally in gowns, long dresses, tuxedos, suits etc. and exchange corsages and boutonnieres after having a formal dance.Â

settings.title: What prom dress should I wear?
settings.answer: The dress that abides by the school dress code. There have been cases when students have been asked to leave because of inappropriate attire. It can be very embarrassing and disheartening at the same time. It is highly advised to follow all the instructions given by the school in terms of prom attire. Also, your prom dress should suit your individual style and personality. It shouldnât make you look like someone youâre not. If youâre elegant and cute, go for a simple a-line prom dress with minimal embellishments, but if youâre bold and bossy, arrive in an eye-catching, figure-flattering ensemble that demands attention. Remember, your dress choice should be in harmony with your schoolâs dress code. Â

settings.title: What to do after-prom? What happens after-prom? What do you do at prom?
settings.answer: After prom activities include going to the after-prom school party or going out with a group of close friends or a date. It could be a fun evening party, a sports bar meet, a bowling session, a casual pyjama party, or a romantic dinner date or movie night. All you have to do is either get the after-prom party tickets or make plans with your friends. Our âThe Night of Promâ section will answer your questions in detail.Â

settings.title: What color prom dress should I wear?
settings.answer: Many colors are trending for Prom 2021! From shades of blue, such as ice blue, lavender, teal, turquoise, navy blue, midnight blue, royal blue, and sky blue, etc. to pink prom dresses, blush, nude, hot pink and baby pink ensembles, blues and pinks will be everywhere. Other than that, burgundy, wine, coral, emerald, sapphire and champagne prom dresses will be selling out fast. Red prom dresses and black ones are evergreen as always. Silver, golden, and metallic colors are other prom favorites for 2021! Wear a color that compliments your skin tone, hair and eye color, and matches your individual style.

settings.page_description: In this section, we will take up all your prom-related queries. From what is prom to what are after-prom activities, we answer it all - in the simplest words possible. Find prom-related advice, dress suggestions, and tips on planning for prom. Refer to our prom guide for detailed suggestions!

settings.title: Know About Homecoming
settings.answer:
If you are going to start high school, then it is time to expect your homecoming party pretty soon. If you are new to this, you might be thinking, "what is a homecoming party"? Well, homecoming is the celebration for high school students that celebrates week-long activities. It is to celebrate school spirit that includes various activities and homecoming dance at the end. It is a tradition in the U.S that has been followed for the past many years. All the activities at the homecoming aim to bring together the high school and the whole community to pay gratitude to the school spirit. If you do not know when homecoming is, you may ask the school board. It depends on schools to decide the homecoming time. However, many schools celebrate homecoming at the beginning of the school year. Many first-year high school students wonder what homecoming is about. But there is nothing to worry about. Homecoming is just a week-long of fun where you dress up nicely, participate in the activities and become a part of the homecoming dance.

What is HoCo?

HoCo, meaning homecoming activities include a pep rally, a football game, parade and the homecoming dance. What is hoco, you ask? We call homecoming as hoco more often, and it is the time of your high school that you do not want to miss. So, stop wondering around questions like what does homecoming mean and what year is a homecoming. If your high school is starting soon, it means you have to start preparing for the day. Therefore, focus more on things like what you need for homecoming and how to go to homecoming.

What happens at Homecoming?

Homecoming is exciting; not just the dance but other activities also make your week special. The parade cheers up for the football game that also features handmade homecoming floats. The school marching band leads this parade, and it feels like the school's annual day. There is a lot to enjoy at homecoming. If you are a football fan, find a seat near your batchmates, teachers and sit in the bleachers. Even if you are not a football fan, you'll get to know about the homecoming traditions, homecoming court meaning, and everything else about the celebration.
You are going to love the homecoming dance part. From dancing with your homecoming court to the curiosity of knowing the homecoming king and queen, there is a lot you will experience. Go through this guide and read all the things to know about homecoming.

Everything about homecoming

You'll get to know what is the difference between prom and homecoming, what is homecoming king and queen and much more. If you are in too much confusion about the homecoming, get answers to all the queries. Be ready for the big celebration and get a dreamy dress. You will meet a bunch of people at the celebration, from seniors to juniors. Hence, it is important to dress at your best. Your thoughts might be asking, do freshmen go to homecoming or not? Well, when we said homecoming is a school spirit celebration, we meant the whole school attends the event, and so do the freshers. So, prepare for it at your best.

settings.title: Homecoming Style
settings.answer:
What to Wear to Homecoming?

Homecoming is a special event, and your homecoming dress has to be worth wearing at the big celebration. This section of the homecoming guide for teens will help you figure out the right dress for homecoming. Couture Candy is the perfect store for you to choose the ideal dress for your big day. If you do not have an idea what girls wear to homecoming, do not stress, you are not alone. This guide will tell you all about homecoming outfit ideas for high school, hoco makeup looks, how to do hair for homecoming, and more. Keep reading to get the perfect look for the homecoming.

Know the dress code

Before you decide on the dress, know whatâs the school dress code for the event. This is the main thing to consider before looking at the best homecoming outfits. This homecoming dress guide has more helpful tips for choosing your best homecoming outfits. Hereâs another one, do not forget to confirm the restrictions of the homecoming dress code. You do not want to get embarrassed after entering the school venue because you chose the wrong dress. Make a rundown of your homecoming dress ideas according to the dress code, and then choose the best one. The school committee might have put restrictions on cutouts or illusion gowns. You must confirm before deciding on the hoco outfits.

Check the formality

The homecoming invitation tells you about the type of celebration. Check whether you need a casual, semi-formal, or formal outfit. Homecoming outfits are of different types, and you have to pick the right one suited for the type of celebration.

Prioritize personal style

After that, you need to consider your personal style. Prefer dresses that match your vibe. Decide whether you want something whimsical like high-low dresses or fall homecoming dresses or something more catchy like sequins. One last thing to consider is the color of the dress. Talking about the homecoming dance dresses, the color should contrast with homecoming court dresses. Court, in simpler words, is your date to the homecoming. He is the guy with whom you will be dancing off the final homecoming night. Homecoming guys wear bright colors like yellow or radiant red. Ask your court about his outfit and choose yours accordingly.

Semi-formal dresses like minis are what a freshman girl should wear to homecoming. But modern homecoming dresses are more flirty and stylish. You can prefer something elegant as well as stylish for the party. The preferable flirty styles in 2021 include jumpsuits and rompers. Most girls panic as the event comes nearby, and they canât find a homecoming dress. But you do not have to take it too heavy on yourself. Couture Candy a collection of the best homecoming dresses. You can easily find the right dress suiting all your requirements even if you check at the last minute.

Remember that itâs not only your dress that makes the impression. Your hoco makeup and hoco accessories also play an important part. Imagine if you appear at the party in a flared glittery gown with a plunging neckline, but your hair is tangled, nails are undone, and the accessories are gaudy. Nobody would notice your dress, all they would do is judge your makeup and hair. You can easily find easy hoco makeup looks and hairstyles for hoco according to your dress. Research and carry a gorgeous appearance all over. Leave nothing for people to point out and back-bitch about.

settings.title: High School Homecoming vs. College Homecoming
settings.answer:
Everyone from family, friends, alumni, students to teachers can attend homecoming. It is the event where all the students gather to enjoy and support the pep rallies, football games, hoco dance, and celebrate the spirit week together. What is homecoming in high school? Is it different from what homecoming is in college? When do you have homecoming? All these questions must have burdened you. Do not worry. It is everyone's first time in college and high school. Let us tell you, homecoming in college is quite similar to that of high school. The purpose in college is also similar to what the purpose of homecoming in high school was. But there is a slight difference between the two.

The time of the event- college vs. high school

It differs in what grade do you have homecoming. In high school, you have your homecoming when shifting to the higher class. The schools held homecoming for upper-level students. But it may also be for students of all the classes. Do freshmen go to homecoming? Yes, they can. It depends on the board to decide in what grade the homecoming is in high school. Some schools held it for all the grades, and some held it when a grade transfers to a higher year. It is a chance for first-year students to meet the students of senior year or upperclassmen. However, it might not be possible for all the schools to organize a homecoming dance for first-year students and upperclassmen together. They might organize it separately for them. You can check with the school's hoco committee about the homecoming dance.
Whereas in college, the homecoming is to welcome back the alumni on the campus. Plus, it is a longer celebration than that in school. Although the event is held for alumni, everyone can participate in the activities. From freshman to senior year students, everybody can join the fun-filled week. It does not matter what year homecoming is. For whichever year the homecoming be, you have to participate in the activities and be a part of the celebration. Plus, there are greater activities in college homecoming than high school. There is powderpuff football, street painting, homecoming dance, movie night, parade, and a football game at the end.

Here are some high school homecoming tips.

When in high school, you can take your friends and family to the homecoming event and enjoy the rally and game with them. You can cheer for your classmates at the football game and dance off the goodbye to the event in the pretty homecoming dress. However, some schools may have certain rules regarding who can attend homecoming. So you should prefer to ask the hoco committee about it before inviting your friends.

settings.title: How much does Homecoming cost?
settings.answer:
The total amount that you would spend at Homecoming depends on the cost of the homecoming ticket and the homecoming outfit. These are the two main things that you would need for the party. Then comes the secondary expense of accessories, footwear, hair, and makeup. Other expenses include planned activities like going out with your friends. You need to get an idea of homecoming tickets' cost and other things. If you want to plan the budget beforehand, ask your hoco committee about the homecoming ticket. Then make a list of all your expenses, including the ticket, the price of your favorite dress, the makeup, footwear, clutch, and everything else. If you need a dress from a popular designer, you should shop from a store that offers dresses at discounts.

Factors to count in

The total homecoming cost can differ depending on how you plan the budget. There are a myriad of dresses that you can buy under budget. The ideal stores have dresses under $100. If you plan it wisely, you can get the right dress under the planned budget. When it comes to tickets, you should try and get them a few days before the homecoming party. Last-minute tickets can cost you more. Rest, you can do your hair, makeup, and nails by yourself. If you have makeup and hairdo skills, doing it at home can save you quite a good amount of bucks. Or, if you have not got hands on these, drag your friends into the business. Avoiding hair, makeup, and nail expenses can drastically decrease the homecoming cost.

Making the list

When making the budget for your Homecoming, there are a few factors to count. Go through the list below and find out the average cost for every essential thing.

Tickets: The homecoming ticket prices depend from school to school. You might have to spend $15-$30 on the ticket. Some schools also take the fee during the start of the school year along with the academic fees. You may also get discounted tickets if you buy them with your date or friends.

Dress: The budget for the dress may range from $0 to $150 and more. If you want to wear a dress from your closet, you won't need any budget for this section. If you want to splurge on a new dress, you can get a lot of cheap dresses under a reasonable amount.

Shoes: $0-$80+

Hair: $0-80+

Nails: $0-$30+

From dresses to tickets, homecoming preparations can fall under your budget with nice planning. Choose to spend your money on the things that are important for your homecoming experience.

settings.title: what is homecoming dance?
settings.answer:
Planning a girls' homecoming dance is fun but not easy. It comes with a lot of planning, but it is all worth it in the end. When you start looking at the things to do for the homecoming dance, it looks like a list that will never end. But you have to know everything about what to do at the homecoming dance. It needs a lot of preparation, from asking for a date, arranging the ride, preparing the dress, to everything else. There is a lot to do. You need to know how to prepare for it and what to do before the homecoming dance. The key is to start with jotting down everything that you need for the dance party. Know how to budget perfectly and start preparing at the right time. There is no better time than to start preparing now. Therefore, this section will help you get started with all the necessary things for the homecoming dance. Know how to plan a homecoming dance, homecoming dance rules, what to wear at the homecoming dance, and more.

What is a homecoming dance?

A high school homecoming is a celebration for the students of senior year. The celebration is mainly for the athletes in senior year, who are football players. The homecoming dance follows all the other activities, including football games, pep rallies, and more. The dance is the final point of the week-long celebration. The event is organized following an exciting homecoming dance, food ideas, and great decoration at the venue. There is a lot to experience and plan.

Homecoming gift ideas

When you know when the homecoming dance is, and you have your date, start planning the homecoming dance gift ideas. If you want to take your date on dinner, you also have to figure out homecoming dance dinner ideas. Include all these things in your to do list and finalize all of them before the big day.

The homecoming dance

If you do not know when the homecoming dance is, it is on the final day of the homecoming week. The homecoming dance is where everybody, including the school alumni and upper-level students, gathers for a dance party. If you have your dance partner for the day, decide what to wear to a homecoming dance. To be the homecoming king or queen, you need to dress up really nice and give an impressive performance. Learn dances to do at homecoming before the evening, and that would be your easy key to impress everyone at the party.
What do guys wear to the homecoming dance? Well, guys usually choose bright tuxedos and an impressive hairstyle that matches the outfit of their date. You can plan it before the evening and carry a matching look to the dance venue.

settings.title: Homecoming Week Theme Ideas
settings.answer:
Is your homecoming week arriving soon? This means you should get ready for the unbeatable, long-running fun. But homecoming is nothing without a fun planned theme. The whole homecoming week is full of various activities, and there is a lot to experience. The activities like basketball, homecoming games, pep rally, dance, art, etc., make the homecoming week full of excitement. However, it all looks and feels better if there are themes for homecoming week. All the students participate in homecoming activities, and therefore, it is your chance to bring out the best celebration. You may choose the Hollywood homecoming theme or basketball homecoming theme, or anything else. Deciding on the theme should be there in your homecoming to-do list. Therefore, this section of the guide will illustrate more on the homecoming theme ideas. Read on to know more.

What to include

High school homecoming themes can be fun, just like the college homecoming themes. You can introduce a decorating contest. Decorating the hallway is a great opportunity to show the pride of the class, and itâs fun. The school can have a fun appearance with all the hallways decorated with different banners, gossamers, murals, and more. Apart from this, you can decide on a particular dress theme according to the venue. Scheduling homecoming week dress-up days is a great idea to make the week more fun. Students, mainly girls, are more driven to choose a perfect dress and show up in their best version. They find it exciting to attend the homecoming in a unique dress-up. So, you can include it in the homecoming theme.

The most popular homecoming themes in 2021 include:

  • Superhero
  • Class color
  • Hollywood
  • Nerd
  • Favorite Movie
  • Celebrity
  • The 80s
  • Celebrity
  • Wacky hair
  • Western
  • College t-shirt
  • Sports team
  • â¦ and more.

Deciding on the homecoming theme can be fun. Homecoming is a memorable part of your school and college life, and you have to make it worth it. Even if you are not on the hoco committee, go with the themes. Your school may host any of the above themes or even anything else, but it will be fun. Do not forget to take pictures in your theme costume.
